elements.comments: This aspect keeps the element from being placed in ANY consuming slot of a Rite.
This aspect keeps the element from being placed in ANY non-consuming slot of a Rite.

elements.description: A tool I can employ in a Rite
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in (the Tool slot of) a Rite.

elements.description: A tool I cannot employ in a Rite
elements.comments: This aspect keeps the element from being placed in (the Tool slot of) a Rite.

elements.description: Lore I can employ in a Rite
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in (the Lore slot of) a Rite.

elements.description: Lore I cannot employ in a Rite
elements.comments: This aspect keeps the element from being placed in (the Lore slot of) a Rite.

elements.description: An ingredient I can employ in a Rite
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in (the Ingredient slot of) a Rite.

elements.description: An ingredient I can't employ in a Rite?
elements.comments: This aspect keeps the element from being placed in (the Ingredient slot of) a Rite.

elements.description: Influence I can employ in a Rite
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in (the Influence slot of) a Rite.

elements.description: Influence I cannot employ in a Rite
elements.comments: This aspect keeps the element from being placed in (the Influence slot of) a Rite.

elements.description: A follower I can employ in a Rite
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in (the Follower slot of) a Rite.

elements.description: A follower I cannot employ in a Rite
elements.comments: This aspect keeps the element from being placed in (the Follower slot of) a Rite.

This aspect allows the element to be placed in (the Desire slot of) a Rite.
Also see modded_normal_rituals_forbidden,
This aspect keeps the element from being placed in (the Desire slot of) a Rite.

elements.description: Something that cannot be used in the Rite Intercalate.
elements.comments: This aspect keeps the element from being placed in (ANY slot of) the Rite Intercalate.

elements.description: Something that can be used only in the Rite Intercalate.
elements.comments: This aspect keeps the element from being placed in (ANY slot of) any Rite other than the Rite Intercalate.
